title: ARGOS Synthetic Hotel Optimization Datasets
description: Synthetic datasets generated by the ARGOS (Adaptive Recursive Gradient Optimization System) simulator, including long-horizon hotel trajectories, high-volatility and staff-shortage scenarios, hyperparameter sweep summaries, QUBO example matrices, and multi-unit traffic simulations. All data are fully synthetic and intended for reproducibility and benchmarking of lexicographic optimization methods in hotel and multi-unit management.
notes: All datasets are fully synthetic and contain no real hotel or personal data.
